title: Drawing, "Left Part of a Sketch of El Yemen Valley, Arabia: More Distant View", February 20, 1868
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray paper
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite, at upper left: Yemen
Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, at upper right: El
description:
Recto: horizontal continuation of the representation in [1917-4]-177 reverse.

Verso: horizontal left part of a still more distant view of the valley.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Left Part of a Sketch of El Yemen Valley, Arabia: More Distant View", February 20, 1868.
February 20, 1868. Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-178.
